pr_title: Fix edge case for ObjectUFS when looking at root path

timeline.message: Fix cases for ObjectUnderFileSystem when looking at root and doesn't end with path separator

timeline.bodyText: Can you add a unit tests for this?
timeline.author: gpang
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1117,7 +1117,8 @@ protected boolean parentExists(String path) throws IOException {
    * @return the path without the bucket prefix
    */
   protected String stripPrefixIfPresent(String path) {
-    String stripedKey = CommonUtils.stripPrefixIfPresent(path,
+    String stripedKey = CommonUtils.stripPrefixIfPresent(
+        PathUtils.normalizePath(path, PATH_SEPARATOR),

timeline.bodyText: What would the previous code have returned?
timeline.author: gpang

replies.bodyText: The previous code would have returned s3a:// + BUCKET_NAME
replies.author: bradyoo

timeline.bodyText: Could you add a few more tests cases to test the method stripPrefixIfPresent?
timeline.author: gpang

timeline.bodyText: Should there be 1 additional case of something like "s3a://" + BUCKET_NAME + "/path/" ?
timeline.author: gpang

replies.bodyText: ah right yeah I'll do that.
replies.author: bradyoo
